title: This website / blog is 15 years old this week. Thank you all for following!
content:
Just wanted to mark the occasion.

(Our blogroll goes all the way back to the start. And you can see snapshots of the early pages on the WayBack Machine.)

Released three books. Created 1500+ infographics and visualisations. Accompanied by 2000+ datasets.
Hosted 272 workshops attended by over 7,800 people.
Presented at 192 conferences, meetings, events and live shows.

Itâ€™s been a long, fun, sweet, complicated creative journey. Thanks for joining me!

David
author: David McCandless
